title: Social Studies Education Design Utilizing Digital Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital device operation and foundational knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: A Course to Strengthen Social Studies Storytelling Production Skills Using Digital Tools for Undergraduate Elementary Education Majors Aged 40+. Flexible Learning Environments via BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

learning_goals: Learners can produce a 3-minute digital storytelling content piece reflecting social studies education themes.
Learners can perform the analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation phases of a digital storytelling project following the ADDIE model.
Learners can enhance the educational effectiveness of digital storytelling content through peer feedback and self-reflection.

resources: Digital Storytelling Creation Tools (Canva, Adobe Spark, etc.)
Social Studies Education Thematic Case Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
